Package org.drip.simm20.risk

SIMM 2.0 Risk Factor Weights

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreditBucket
    CreditBucket holds the ISDA SIMM 2.0 Credit Quality, Sector List, and Risk Weights for a given Credit Qualifying/Non-Qualifying Issuer Exposure Bucket.
    CreditNonQualifyingSystemics
    CreditNonQualifyingSystemics contains the Systemic Settings of the Credit Non-Qualifying Risk Factors.
    CreditQualifyingSystemics
    CreditQualifyingSystemics contains the Systemic Settings of the Credit Qualifying Risk Factors.
    CreditSystemics
    CreditSystemics contains the Systemic Settings Common to both Qualifying and Non-Qualifying Credit Risk Factors.
    InterestRateSystemics
    InterestRateSystemics contains the Systemic Settings of the Interest Rate Risk Factors.
    InterestRateWeight
    InterestRateWeight holds the ISDA SIMM 2.0 Tenor Vertex Risk Weights for Currencies across all Volatility Types.
    MarketCapitalizationSystemics
    MarketCapitalizationSystemics contains the Systemic Settings that contain the Market Capitalization Classification.
    RegionSystemics
    RegionSystemics contains the Systemic Settings that contain the Region Details.
    SectorSystemics
    SectorSystemics contains the Systemic Settings that hold Sector-related Information.

Package org.drip.simm20.risk Description

SIMM 2.0 Risk Factor Weights
Author:
Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
